hanzi-su-wiki:
弘

Значения

Широкий; распространять, расширять; распространяться

Мнемоника

Растягивать лук 弓 на полную ширину, до локтя 厶.

hóng
great; liberal
здорово; либеральный
rtega_mnemonic:
弘弘RSenlarge, expand, liberal, great
  • individual 厶 capable of firing a bow 弓: a great man with liberal thoughts, his reign is expanding
強
purpleculture_examples:
弘扬 [ hóng yáng ]: to enhance; to promote; to enrich
弘图 [ hóng tú ]: variant of 宏图
弘治 [ hóng zhì ]: Hongzhi Emperor, reign name of ninth Ming emperor 朱祐樘
弘法 [ hóng fǎ ]: to propagate Buddhist teachings
弘愿 [ hóng yuàn ]: variant of 宏愿

heisig_chinese_memo: If you pull the bow back with your elbow so as not to get your hands dirty, like a true noble man, you can also shoot a vast distance.
koohiiStory1: If you pull the bow back with your elbow, you can shoot a vast distance.
koohiiStory2: The valley was so vast that if you yelled elbow! you could hear it echo bow, bow, bow.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you pull the bow back with your elbow so as not to get your hands dirty, like a true noble man, you can also shoot a vast distance.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscriptions start from " mouth " and " bow ". " Bow " is also a sound symbol. "口" means making a sound. Xu Shen believes that the original meaning of " hong " is the sound made by a bow. One said that the original meaning is loud (Qiu Xigui). The word " hong ", which is common with " hong ", can be spoken loudly. "Said Wen": "Acer, the house is deep." "Zhou Li. Kao Gong Ji. Ziren": "Its voice is loud and magnificent", Zheng Xuan's note: "Zheng Sinongyun: "Hong is pronounced as Hongji Zhihong, so the voice is loud."

Extending from the sound, it means the general meaning of the big, such as the oath, the wish, and the plan. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Hong, Daye." Xing Mingshu: "Hong who is rich in content." Qing Duan Yucai "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "Hong, the scriptures often false this seal is a grand character. ""easy. Kun": "Han Hong Guangda". "poetry. Daya. "Min Lao": "Although Rong is a boy, he is in Hongda." Zheng Xuanjian: "Hong, You Guang Ye."

Expand and promote Everbright, also known as " Hong ", "Zihui": "Hong, Dazhiye." "Book. Weizi’s Life": "Hong Nai Lie Zu". Kong Chuan: "The Great Rulie Ancestor became the way of soup." "The Analects. "Wei Linggong": "People can promote the Tao, but not the Tao." Zhuge Liang "Teacher List": "Great lofty spirit."

The shape of the character " hong " in the oracle bone inscriptions varies, from " bow " above " kou ", " kou " written in " bow ", or bow written on the left or right of the mouth. When the Chinese character " hong " is used as a radical, the " mouth " shape becomes a circle, see "宖".

Jia Jinwen is used as a person's name.

"Shuowen": "Hong, the sound of the bow. From the bow, the sound of the sibilant. Si, the ancient Chinese word for brachial." The sound of the sound fell into the well, and the sound of the sound was great." Li Shan said: "Yin, the sound of the wind blowing curtains." The meaning of the bow sound is extended to his voice."

According to the Bronze inscription " Hong " starts from " mouth ", not from the ancient Chinese " humeral ", " bow " is the sound symbol of " Hong ".
humanum_short_description_en: " Hong " means the sound of a bow. One said that the voice is loud (Qiu Xigui).
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「口」從「弓」，「弓」亦是聲符，「口」表示發出聲音，許慎認為「弘」的本義是弓發出的聲音。一說本義是聲音洪大(裘錫圭)。與「弘」通用的「宏」字，可以當聲音洪大講。《說文》：「宏，屋深響也。」《周禮．考工記．梓人》：「其聲大而宏」，鄭玄注：「鄭司農云：『宏讀為紘綖之紘，謂聲音大也。』」(裘錫圭)

　　由聲音大引申，表示一般意義的大，如弘誓、弘願、弘圖等。《爾雅．釋詁》：「弘，大也。」邢昺疏：「弘者，含容之大也。」清段玉裁《說文解字注》：「弘，經傳多假此篆為宏大字。」《易．坤》：「含弘光大」。《詩．大雅．民勞》：「戎雖小子，而式弘大。」鄭玄箋：「弘，猶廣也。」

　　擴大、弘揚光大又稱「弘」，《字彙》：「弘，大之也。」《書．微子之命》：「弘乃烈祖」。孔傳：「大汝烈祖成湯之道。」《論語．衛靈公》：「人能弘道，非道弘人。」諸葛亮〈出師表〉：「恢弘志士之氣。」

　　甲骨文「弘」字的構形多變，或從「弓」在「口」之上，或把「口」寫在「弓」裏面，或弓寫在口的左邊或右邊。金文「弘」字用作偏旁時，「口」形訛變為圓形，參見「宖」字。

　　甲金文用作人名。

　　《說文》：「弘，弓聲也。从弓，厶聲。厶，古文肱字。」段玉裁注：「〈甘泉賦〉曰：『帷弸彋其拂汨兮。』蘇林云：『弸音石墮井弸爾之弸，彋音宏。』李善曰：『弸彋，風吹帷帳之聲也。』是則弓聲之義引申爲他聲。」

　　按甲金文「弘」從「口」，不從古文「肱」，「弓」才是「弘」的聲符。
humanum_short_description: 「弘」表示弓發出的聲音。一說表示聲音洪大(裘錫圭)。

甲金文從「 口 」從「 弓 」，「 弓 」亦是聲符，「 口 」表示發出聲音，許慎認為「 弘 」的本義是弓發出的聲音。一說本義是聲音洪大(裘錫圭)。與「 弘 」通用的「 宏 」字，可以當聲音洪大講。《說文》：「宏，屋深響也。」《周禮．考工記．梓人》：「其聲大而宏」，鄭玄注：「鄭司農云：『宏讀為紘綖之紘，謂聲音大也。』」(裘錫圭) 由聲音大引申，表示一般意義的大，如弘誓、弘願、弘圖等。《爾雅．釋詁》：「弘，大也。」邢昺疏：「弘者，含容之大也。」清段玉裁《說文解字注》：「弘，經傳多假此篆為宏大字。」《易．坤》：「含弘光大」。《詩．大雅．民勞》：「戎雖小子，而式弘大。」鄭玄箋：「弘，猶廣也。」 擴大、弘揚光大又稱「 弘 」，《字彙》：「弘，大之也。」《書．微子之命》：「弘乃烈祖」。孔傳：「大汝烈祖成湯之道。」《論語．衛靈公》：「人能弘道，非道弘人。」諸葛亮〈出師表〉：「恢弘志士之氣。」 甲骨文「 弘 」字的構形多變，或從「 弓 」在「 口 」之上，或把「 口 」寫在「 弓 」裏面，或弓寫在口的左邊或右邊。金文「 弘 」字用作偏旁時，「 口 」形訛變為圓形，參見「 宖 」字。 甲金文用作人名。 《說文》：「弘，弓聲也。从弓，厶聲。厶，古文肱字。」段玉裁注：「〈甘泉賦〉曰：『帷弸彋其拂汨兮。』蘇林云：『弸音石墮井弸爾之弸，彋音宏。』李善曰：『弸彋，風吹帷帳之聲也。』是則弓聲之義引申爲他聲。」 按甲金文「 弘 」從「 口 」，不從古文「 肱 」，「 弓 」才是「 弘 」的聲符。

One said that the original meaning is loud (Qiu Xigui). The word " hong", which is common with " hong", can be spoken loudly. "Said Wen": "Acer, the house is deep." "Zhou Li. Kao Gong Ji. Ziren": "Its voice is loud and magnificent", Zheng Xuan's note: "Zheng Sinongyun: "Hong is pronounced as Hongji Zhihong, so the voice is loud." Extending from the sound, it means the general meaning of the big, such as the oath, the wish, and the plan. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Hong, Daye." Xing Mingshu: "Hong who is rich in content." Qing Duan Yucai "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "Hong, the scriptures often false this seal is a grand character. ""easy. Kun": "Han Hong Guangda". "poetry. Daya. Zhuge Liang "Teacher List": "Great lofty spirit." The shape of the character " hong" in the oracle bone inscriptions varies, from " bow" above " kou", " kou" written in " bow", or bow written on the left or right of the mouth. When the Chinese character " hong" is used as a radical, the " mouth" shape becomes a circle, see " 宖". Jia Jinwen is used as a person's name. "Shuowen": "Hong, the sound of the bow. From the bow, the sound of the sibilant. Si, the ancient Chinese word for brachial." The sound of the sound fell into the well, and the sound of the sound was great." Li Shan said: "Yin, the sound of the wind blowing curtains." The meaning of the bow sound is extended to his voice." According to the Bronze inscription " Hong" starts from " mouth", not from the ancient Chinese " humeral", " bow" is the sound symbol of " Hong".

弘字的基本解释

弘
hóng
大（现多用“宏”）：弘愿。弘图。弘业。弘谋。恢弘（ａ．宽阔、广大，如“气度弘弘”；ｂ．发扬，如“弘弘士气”。亦作“恢宏”）。
扩充，光大：弘扬。
姓。

弘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》胡肱切，平登，匣。］
(1)弓声。
(2)大；广。
(3)廓大；光大。
(4)宽容。
(5)姓。汉有弘恭。见《汉书》本传。

弘字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弘； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页356第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?胡肱切，或平聲。【說文】弓聲也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】大也。【疏】弘者，含容之大也。【易·坤彖】含弘光大。　又【正韻】大之也。【論語】人能弘道。　又叶胡公切，音洪。【陸機·贈弟雲詩】懷襲瑰瑋，璠植淸風。非德莫動，非道莫弘。　又叶胡光切，音皇。【陸雲·陸常侍誄】於穆皇源，時惟誕弘。權輿有嬀，爰帝曁王。

弘字的源字形

弘字的起名意思

：指扩充，光大；扩大、推广。

Hiroshi
Basic explanation of words
Hiroshi
hóng
Da ("Macro" is now often used): Hongyuan. Hongtu. Hongye. Hongmou. Majestic (a. Broad and vast, such as "benevolence Honghong"; b. Carry forward, such as "Honghong morale". Also called "majestic").
Expansion, China Everbright: Carry forward.
name.
Hiroshi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu humeral cut, Ping Deng, Xia. ]
(1) Bow sound.
(2) Big; wide.
(3) The profile is large; Everbright.
(4) Tolerance.
(5) Last name. Han Yuhong Gong. See the biography of "Han Shu".

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hu humeral cut, or flat sound. [Said the text] The bow is also.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Da Ye. [Sparse] Hongzhe, contain the capacity of greatness. 【Yi·Kunyu】Hang Hong Guangda.　[Zheng Yun] It's also big. [The Analects] People can promote the Tao.　 Ye Hu Gong cut again, Yin Hong. [Lu Ji·Yun Poems for My Brother] Embrace Guiwei and grow wind. Do not move, not do not move.　Ye Hu Guangqie again, Yinhuang. 【Lu Yun·Lu Chang Attendant】Yu Mu Huangyuan, Shi Wei Danhong. Quan Yu has Zhuo, Yao Emperor Shu Wang.

Name meaning
: Refers to expansion, China Everbright; expansion, promotion.
弘
形声字。弓表意,其甲骨文形体像一张弓,表示发弓的声音;ム(gong)表声,“ム”为古“肱”字,肱指胳膊,表示张弓
射箭要用臂力。本义指发弓的声音。引申为大。
①大:~大|~图|~论。2扩充;光大:~扬「恢~。3
hóng
姓。
~论 ~图 ~扬 ~愿 ~旨 恢~ 取精用~
弘。
萊
素
楷
Хироши
Пиктофонетические символы.
Лук означает, что надпись из кости оракула похожа на лук, что означает звук поклона; ム (гонг) означает звук древней «плечевой кости», а плечевая кость относится к руке, что означает, что используется сила руки. открыть лук и выстрелить из стрелы.
Первоначальное значение относится к звуку поклонения.
Расширение большое.
①Большой: ~ Большой | ~ Изображение | ~ Вкл.
